select_sql: [No_], [Vendor No_], [Vendor Item No_], [Description], [Description 2], [Type], [Item Category Code], [Blocked], 0 AS [Purchasing Blocked], [Gross Weight], [Unit Volume], [Unit Cost], [Order Multiple], [Maximum Inventory], [Unit Price], [Base Unit of Measure], [Minimum Order Quantity], [Price Includes VAT], [Production BOM No_], [Last Direct Cost], [Lead Time Calculation], [Replenishment System], [Purch_ Unit of Measure], [Reordering Policy], [Safety Stock Quantity], [Reorder Point]

where_sql: [Item No_] not in (select [No_] from dbo.[Fortress Interlocks$Item] where [Item Type] = 'OBSOLETE') and [Location Code] in ('US','UK')
